column5: We loved the view so much, we bought the condo!  Amazing third story view of Lake Travis within the luxurious 'Island at Lake Travis'. You can enjoy the view of the lake with one of the three beautiful pools in the foreground and undeveloped Pace Bend Park in the background. Or, enjoy the Mediterranean style condominium complex amenities located on the private island.
column8: Condo With Amazing View of Lake Travis
